Articles.Content:
I have noticed a surprising lack of just normal planes. There are one or two replica crafts, but i am quite interested in new ideas and things I haven't seen before. To kick it off, ill post my very first plane. The Eagle. Named because of the effects when it enters the atmosphere after accelerating out of it. 

Rules:

- can run on oxidizer. But must flame-out in space.

- must be able to land.

- must be able to circumnavigate the planet. 

- must be stock.

![m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#0](http://imgur.com/m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#0)![m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#1](http://imgur.com/m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#1)![m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#2](http://imgur.com/m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#2)![m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#3](http://imgur.com/m8ZXi82,Gd3HwRX,TGcEBGJ,SfWr2rN#3)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-06T06:26:52Z" title="04/06/2015 06:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 6, 2015</time> by Claw**
  
fixed image links

Hi thegodmobile,

I fixed your image links so that they are easier to see, but also put them in a spoiler tag since they are large. The other neat thing about IMGUR is that you can upload multiple pictures and make an album. Then you can post a link to that album here in the forum by using the [noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/XXXXX)

[/noparse] tags. Just replace the Xs with the five letter IMGUR album identifier (that shows up in the address bar).
Nice craft, and welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

"I have noticed a surprising lack of just normal planes"

I believe that's a bit in the eye of the beholder.

I've seen hundreds of "normal" planes. In fact your configuration is pretty unique.
